sentences: Sees others primarily as tools to be used and discarded.
Holds grudges forever and waits patiently for revenge.
Believes might makes right and the strong should rule the weak.
Manipulative and calculating, always working an angle.
Takes pleasure in the misfortune of rivals and enemies.
Lies easily and convincingly whenever it serves a purpose.
Trusts no one completely, always expecting betrayal.
Ambitious to a fault, willing to step on others to climb higher.
Views kindness and mercy as weaknesses to be exploited.
Driven by greed, always wanting more than what's possessed.
Cruel to those weaker, though careful to hide it from authorities.
Respects only power and those who wield it effectively.
Breaks promises whenever breaking them is more profitable.
Envious of others' success and works to undermine it.
Charming on the surface but cold and calculating beneath.
Believes morality is a construct used by the weak to constrain the strong.
Enjoys having power over others and isn't subtle about it.
Paranoid about threats, seeing enemies in every shadow.
Self-serving to the core, loyal only to personal interests.
Patient and methodical when planning someone's downfall.
Enjoys manipulating others into conflict.
Keeps secrets as leverage against allies.
Thinks compassion is a weakness to exploit.
Seeks control even in small, petty ways.
Will sacrifice anyone to protect personal power.
Mocks ideals and those who cling to them.
Never forgets a slight, no matter how small.
Uses charm to mask ruthless intent.
Believes fear is the most reliable tool.
Enjoys watching others squirm under pressure.
